messages.subject: unschooling friendly homes
messages.msgSnippet: I wasn t really into reading this thread but did catch a few lines every now and then. Last night I was watching MTV2 and they had a piece on with Hugh Hefner.
messages.messageBody:
I wasn't really into reading this thread but did catch a few lines every now and then.

Last night I was watching MTV2 and they had a piece on with Hugh Hefner. Not a favorite of mine but they had him taking them on a tour of his home. Not just the famous grotto but the whole property. And the whole time I was thinking how much fun my family would have in a house like that!! Of course not the kind of fun he's having but definitely an unschooling friendly house!!!!

Mary B

[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
